Reviews.Title: Awsome camera can not put it down!
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: OMG I love this camera. Just had to get it in my favorite color blue. Have yet to snap a photo with it for hours just looking at how sleek the camera is. Once i did take my first shot, I was amazed at the clarity. ALso the easy to use functions of the camera. A very nice inexpensive camera. Im also wanting to do some amateur photography with this camera until I can afford the higher end camera but im in love with this camera already. Great product I would suggest to others. And also with the bundle with the batteries and the charger, case, tripod, hd cord, usb cord, cleaner, and 16 GB SDHC. Cant get any better anywhere else.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 11 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video - Blue (import, backed by Hot Deals Electronics 1 year guarantee)
4 AA High Capacity 2950mah Batteries with Rapid Charger - 16 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader
Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets, & Neck Strap - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens & HD Video - Blue (Import) + 4 AA Batteries with Charger + 9pc Bundle 16GB Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
